rewards.title: Rewards & Points System
rewards.depositDesc: Deposit money to convert into coins and access premium content, advanced courses, and exclusive challenges.
rewards.depositItem1: Unlock advanced courses with in-depth content.
rewards.earnItem1: Complete free learning videos to earn points.
rewards.earnItem3: Share results on social media for extra coins.
rewards.earnItem4: Engage in discussions and help others.
rewards.redeemItem1: Coins can be exchanged for advanced courses.
rewards.redeemItem2: Earn badges and medals for achievements.
rewards.redeemItem3: Get discounts on future courses and challenges.
rewards.redeemItem4: Special gifts and exclusive virtual rewards.
rewards.rankDesc: Earn points by completing activities and participate in ranking systems to unlock additional rewards.
rewards.rankItem1: Top learners will unlock new challenges.
rewards.rankItem2: Earn special badges and virtual rewards.
rewards.rankItem3: Level up to access more advanced content.

landing.description1: Become a full-stack web developer. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React and Node.js. Build dynamic and interactive web applications.
landing.description2: Unlock the power of data with Python. Learn data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization. Build intelligent applications and make data-driven decisions.
landing.description3: Create stunning mobile apps for iOS and Android. Learn Swift, Kotlin, and cross-platform frameworks like Flutter. Bring your app ideas to life.
landing.description4: Immerse yourself in the world of game development. Learn game engines like Unity and Unreal Engine. Create 2D and 3D games.
landing.description5: Protect digital systems from cyber threats. Learn ethical hacking, network security, and cloud security. Become a cybersecurity expert.
